q: Jefferies feels that the move by Google to switch Eric Schmidt to Executive Chairman for CEO could not have come at a better time with such a strong last quarter. They are a little skeptic and state that, it does introduce a level of uncertainty around execution under the new leadership, particularly considering the growing competitive landscape.

His world-view and sense of self are too long held to ever admit that the invasion of Iraq was a mistake and should never have been launched. And I doubt Mr. Donald Rumsfeld will live long enough to reflect and recant his blunders as Mr. McNamara was brave enough to do.
